page.title: 03NUTHURST HEATH FARM
page.content: The manager of this farm is the tenant.His name is Mr.Windridge.The total area of the farm is 180 acres. 15 acres of this is used for arable and the rest is for grazing.He grows his own fruit and vegetables. He grows barley.The animals are for breeding.He has 155 Fresian dairy cattle,1 Chevrolet bull and a Fresian bull.Artificial insemination is used. He feeds his cattle on cow cake and pellets. He has 3 tractors,1 plough,1 fork lift truck,a crop sprayer,2 silage tanks,a large storage building,and he hires a combine harvester.He hires people to help at harvest.
